items.title: Last day to apply for absentee ballot online or by mail
items.description: Voters must submit their absentee ballot application either online or by mail by this date.

items.title: Last day to apply for absentee ballot in person
items.description: Voters may apply for an absentee ballot in person at their county board of elections until this date.

items.title: Last day to mail absentee ballot
items.description: Absentee ballots must be mailed with a postmark no later than Election Day.

items.title: Deadline to drop off absentee ballot at County Board of Elections
items.description: Voters may drop off their completed absentee ballot at the County Board of Elections by this time.

items.title: Drop off absentee ballot at early voting sites
items.description: Voters may drop off their absentee ballot at any early voting poll site during the early voting period.

items.title: Drop off absentee ballot at Election Day poll site
items.description: Voters may drop off their absentee ballot at any Election Day poll site until polls close.
